Reconnect with nature at the secluded Niraamaya Retreats Thekkady, breathe in fresh mountain air and embrace serenity while enjoying daily breakfast, one multi-course dining experience and one relaxing 30-minute head and shoulder massage per person.
offer_address: V&V Estates, Spring Valley, Kumily,Kerala, 685509 Thekkady, India

title: Tranquil Thekkady Eco-Friendly Escape with Daily Dining
description: Perched on a mountaintop amid the untouched greenery of Thekkady in Kerala, hidden by a cloud of mist and bearing a heady aroma of spices, Poetree Sarovar Portico is a heavenly paradise waiting to be discovered. Offering panoramic views of the stunning Sahyadri mountain ranges and Periyar Lake, this eco-friendly resort is just a 9.5-hour drive from Bengaluru and minutes away from the famous Periyar National Park. If you are craving some alone time in the arms of nature, don't look beyond this eco-resort.
offer_address: Ottakathalamedu, Amaravathy P.O, Kumily, Thekkady, Kerala 685509

title: Kerala Nature Retreat Near Periyar Tiger Reserve
description: Discover peace and tranquility in Kerala staying at the hillside nature retreat of Cardamom County near the Periyar Tiger Reserve, home to the elusive Bengal Tiger, elephants and lion-tailed Macaque monkeys. Spend three nights in a cosy Periyar Cottage facing the surrounding bamboo forest and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts and two 3-course dinners (or lunches). Only INR19,999 for two adults, valued up to INR32,000.
offer_address: Kumily Thekkady Road, Thekkady, Kochi, Kerala

title: Tranquil Thekkady Eco-Friendly Escape with Daily Breakfast & Drinks
description:
Perched on a mountaintop amid the untouched greenery of Thekkady in Kerala, hidden by a cloud of mist and bearing a heady aroma of spices, Poetree Sarovar Portico is a heavenly paradise waiting to be discovered. Boasting panoramic views of the stunning Sahyadri mountain ranges and Periyar Lake, this eco-friendly resort offers guests a taste of true wellbeing, flawless hospitality, and rustic ambiance.

Prepare your taste buds for unique dining experiences, ranging from Kusini, serving a melange of regional, Indian and continental flavours, to the Shappu Bar which overlooks the swimming pool and verdant valleys of Thekkady. The spa is always ready to pamper your senses with soothing therapies, while in the evenings, you might choose to enjoy Kathakali dance performances, kalari performances, and much more (charges apply). If you are in need for a jungle getaway, a wellness escape or even a weekend staycation, then this escape is the best option for you.
offer_address: Ottakathalamedu, Amaravathy P.O, Kumily, Thekkady, Kerala 685509

title: Thekkady Rainforest Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily High Tea & Yoga Sessions
description: A jungle escape like no other, Niraamaya Retreats Cardamom Club in Kerala's Thekkady will embrace you in total serenity. This opulent resort is undoubtedly a lovely paradise with its lush green canopy, wide-open gardens for strolling, and a stunning infinity pool to cool you off. You can stay in charming cottages that provide magical views of the mountains and lush vegetation all around while being embraced by tropical rainforests. Try regional specialities that the chefs have crafted with spices from Thekkady. Enjoy a spa treatment or two at the Niraamaya Spa, where professionals will harmonise your senses using ancient Ayurvedic practices. Take advantage of the resort's proximity to the famous Periyar Tiger Reserve with a plethora of activities like safaris, bamboo rafting, boat rides, tea estate visits, etc (extra charges apply).

vendor_name: Amritara Shalimar Spice Garden Resort & Spa Thekkady
title: Serene Thekkady Plantation Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch or Dinner & Drinks
description:
Hidden within the fragrant spice plantations of Thekkady and bordering Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary, Amritara Shalimar Spice Garden Resort & Spa is the perfect Kerala hideaway. Here, you can unwind in straw-covered, charming rooms and cottages that open to views of a verdant plantation where mango, nutmeg, and cardamom trees sway in a gentle breeze that comes from Thekaddy's highlands. It's easy to stay calm and cool in this tranquil resort that rests 800 metres above sea level and is carpeted in lush greenery. This natural haven is a delight to explore on plantation walks, find your inner balance while practising yoga amidst the lush greenery, and indulge in a gastronomic rollercoaster at the multi-cuisine restaurant.

Forget all your worries when you spot the refreshing mountain stream meandering through this Thekkady retreat. Choose from the variety of Ayurvedic massages that are offered to revitalise yourself while aligning your chakras, woo your significant other with a candlelight dinner planned next to a sparkling blue pool under the stars, and pocket the queen at a friendly game of carrom in the game room decorated with real wooden Kerala furnishings.
location_description: Amritara Shalimar Spice Garden Resort & Spa
offer_address: Kumily Alady Road, Viswanathapuram, Thekkady, Periyar, Kerala 685535, India

title: Secluded Thekkady Jungle Paradise with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description: Experience the lush rainforests and calming solitude of Thekkady with a luxury stay at Niraamaya Retreats Cardamom Club, a splendid resort nestled in eight acres of cardamom plantations and surrounded by mountains. This serene paradise is perfect for a jungle getaway, a wellness escape or even a weekend staycation - leave behind city life and unwind in the lap of nature. Treat yourself to a relaxing massage or two in the resort's acclaimed spa, or enjoy a refreshing dip in the stunning infinity pool while enjoying incredible views of the verdant surrounding mountains and valleys.

title: Kerala Nature Retreat near Periyar Tiger Reserve
description: Let your next vacation be right in the lap of nature at Cardamom County by Xandari, a green paradise nestled in the lush Western Ghats of Kerala. Situated on the slopes of a hillock and overlooking the famous Periyar Tiger Reserve, Cardamom County by Xandari promises a relaxing getaway like no other. Enjoy your refreshing escape in God's Own Country with daily breakfast for two, one three-course dinner for two and one 30-minute head massage each for two.
offer_address: Kumily Thekkady Road, Thekkady, Kochi, Kerala

title: Tranquil Thekkady CGH Earth Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Nature Walk
description:
Set in the heart of the cool highlands of Periyar in Thekkady, Spice Village - CGH Earth is a welcome respite from the world's chaos. Designed after the dwellings of the native Manan tribes of the region, this tranquil paradise is an ode to Mother Nature with its eco-friendly architecture and sustainable practices. Scattered across an aromatic spice garden, the resort's earthy cottages are crafted from simple and natural materials and promise to envelop you in Mother Nature's goodness. Located a four-hour drive from Cochin International Airport (COK), this serene retreat offers you the quintessential village experience with a contemporary twist.

Celebrating all things spice, the resort offers many experiences like spice garden walks, spice plantation visits and more. At the resort's two restaurants, you can get a chance to indulge in some deliciously crafted meals from both regional and international cuisines. A sparkling pool, and activities like yoga, meditation, Periyar Tiger Reserve visits and more ensure there's not a dull moment on your escape.
offer_address: Kottayam - Kumily Rd, Thekkady, Kumily, Kerala 685509 Kumily Kerala 685509 India
